definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fashion, delineate (NH id.; so Aram. [[חוּר]], s.wr, s.or; s.uwrto0 picture, Sab. [[חור]], pl. [[חורת]] Hom:Chrest.125 Mordtm:Him. Inschr. 14.15; Ar.  is loan-word acc. to Frä:272);—Pf. 2 ms. [[וְחַרְתָּ֫]] Ez Eze 43:11 (for MT [[חוּרַת]]) acc. to LXX. We Sm Co Toy Berthol Krae, and thou shalt delineate the house (cf. [[הַגֵּד]] v:Eze 43:10, [[הוֹדַע וּכְתׂב]] v:Eze 43:11); Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיׇּ֫חַר אׂתוֹ בַּחֶרֶט]] Ex 32:4 (E) and fashioned it [the gold] with a graving-tool; [[וַיׇּ֫חַר אֶת־שְׁנֵי הָׂעַמּוּדִים]] 1Ki 7:15 (+ acc. mater.), rd. [[וַיִּצּׂק]] ([[יחק]]), so LXX SS Kit Benz cf. Th; 1 S. Sf. [[אחורך]] Je 1:5 Kt, v. [[יחר]] p. 427
